NG0306:1: / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos //
NG0306:2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang */
NG0306:3: byang chub sems pa' rnams la /
NG0306:4: sngags kyi rgyal po bstan pa'i gzung ba 'di ched du brjod do //
NG0306:5: kye ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
NG0306:6: bla na med pa'i byang chub sems //
NG0306:7: 'da' dka' de bzhin mi gshigs pa //
NG0306:8: 'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig yin //
NG0306:9: phyogs bcu dus bzhi rang bzhin dag / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid //
NG0306:10: rang gi rtog pa phra rgyas kyis //
NG0306:11: so sor smin cing sdug bsngal ba //
NG0306:12: grol bar bya phyir bla med rnams //
NG0306:13: bstan phyir rdzogs longs spyod par bstan //
NG0306:14: 'og min bla med gnas mchog tu //
NG0306:15: mgon po bdag nyid chen po ngas //
NG0306:16: rdo rje 'khor lo bskor ba rnams //
NG0306:17: ljags kyi dbang por bkram nas ni //
NG0306:18: kun gyi don du gsungs pa ni //
NG0306:19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang *//
NG0306:20: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang *//
NG0306:21: rnal 'byor rnams kyis brtan por gzung *//
NG0306:22: 'gro ba'i skye bo ji snyed par //
NG0306:23: yi ge 'bri mchod sbyin pa dang *//
NG0306:24: nyan pa dang ni klog pa dang *//
NG0306:25: 'chad dang kha ton byed pa dang *//
NG0306:26: de sems pa dang sgom pa rnams //
NG0306:27: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid //
NG0306:28: bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur //
NG0306:30: rgyal ba rnams kyis rab bsngags pa'i //
NG0306:32: sa yi khyad par bgrod nas ni //
NG0306:33: bde ba chen por 'gyur ba yin //
NG0306:34: sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems //
NG0306:35: sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba rnams //
NG0306:36: rtogs shing 'dzin par byed pa dang *//
NG0306:37: rtag tu 'chang ba gang yin pa //
NG0306:38: de nyid nga dang 'dra bas na //
NG0306:39: sku gsung thugs kyi dbang rnams dang *//
NG0306:40: gsang ba'i don ni bstan pa yin //
NG0306:41: dngos po rnams kyi dam tshig kyang *//
NG0306:42: mthong zhing thos nas rtogs shes yin //
NG0306:43: dam pa rnams kyi dam pa mchog / de bzhin nyid du gnas bcas nas //
NG0306:44: grol thar lam dang 'khor ba rnams //
NG0306:45: ji ltar brjod kyang chos mchog ste //
NG0306:46: de bzhin nyid las nyams pa med //
NG0306:47: de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin pas //
NG0306:48: de la de bzhin gnas mi bya //
NG0306:49: gang gis de bzhin gnas gyur na //
NG0306:50: de bzhin mthong bas de bzhin gshegs //
NG0306:51: de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid la //
NG0306:52: btsal ba med pa'i btsal sems te //
NG0306:53: dmigs pa med pa'i dmigs pa dang *//
NG0306:54: sgom du med pa'i sgom pa yis //
NG0306:55: shes rab gsum gyi bdag nyid can //
NG0306:56: sa rnams ye shes bskyed 'gyur bas //
NG0306:57: yang dag mthong nas lhun gyis 'grub //
NG0306:58: de bzhin gshegs pas rab bsngags pas //
NG0306:59: 'phags dang byis pa'i skye bo dang *//
NG0306:60: rang dang gzhan gyi skye bo rnams //
NG0306:64: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor
NG0306:65: de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig dang dbyangs gcig
NG0306:67: sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po mchog / spyan ras dri med 'od mdzad pa //
NG0306:68: bdag cag kun gyis mthong bas na //
NG0306:69: dpa' bo chen po khyod phyag 'tshal //
NG0306:70: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis //
NG0306:71: yang dag rtogs shing 'dzin pa la //
NG0306:72: rab tu mos pas dus gsum du //
NG0306:73: dpa' bo chen po bzhin phyag 'tshal //
NG0306:74: byang chub 'phags dang gzhan rnams kyis //
NG0306:76: rtogs nas smra bar byed pa la //
NG0306:77: ston pa bzhin du bdag 'tshal lo //
NG0306:78: gang gis ming tsam 'dzin pa yi //
NG0306:79: don 'di sgrub par byed pa na //
NG0306:80: g.yo sgyu med cing gus ldan pas //
NG0306:81: dpa' bo bzhin du bdag phyag 'tshal //
NG0306:82: dpa' bo'i bstan pa bla med pa //
NG0306:83: yi ge med pa'i gsung mchog ste //
NG0306:84: chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin la //
NG0306:85: ston pa bzhin du bdag phyag 'tshal //
NG0306:87: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po dgyes pa chen po des /
NG0306:88: nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyis shin tu mnyes par gyur te /
NG0306:89: dngos po thams cad sgyu ma dang 'dra bar mthong nas /
NG0306:90: sku gsung thugs rdo rje la zhugs te //
NG0306:91: cang mi gsung bar gyur to //
NG0306:92: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad dang *//
NG0306:93: byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad kyang sku gsung thugs rdo rje la zhugs so //
NG0306:94: zhugs pas phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i rang bzhin thams cad
NG0306:95: gcig gi rang bzhin du dbyer med pa'i mnyam pa
NG0306:96: nyid kyi rang bzhin du gyur to //
NG0306:97: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang */
NG0306:99: thugs rdo rje 'bar ba'i rgyud las /
NG0306:100: mnyes pa dang yongs su gzung ba'i le'u ste bcu
NG0306:101: bdun pa'o // // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
NG0306:102: kyi sku dang */ gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba'i mchog dam pa'i gsang chen ces bya ba'i rgyud /
NG0306:103: rnal 'byor gyi ma chen mo de kho na nyid stong phrag brgya pa las /
NG0306:104: rdo rje 'bar ba'i rgyud ces bya ba'i le'u ste
NG0306:105: bcu bdun pa rdzogs so // // rgya gar gyi
NG0306:106: mkhan po dz+nya na gar+b+ha dang */
NG0306:107: bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong rin chen bzang
